questions.quote: Oh Gosh! None of this would never have happened if you wouldn't have said 'God bless you'!
If you wanna live in a butcher shop, I'm gonna treat you like a piece of meat.
What, are you kidding?  The knuckles are all out of proportion. you got hair over there - where do you get off comparing your hands to my hands?! This is a one-in-a-million hand.
Well, what about you? You told me that you were engaged. What was the rest of that?

Oh, don't worry. We'll get you home to your husband real soon.
Oh, no, no, no-no--I don't want any pay. I'm doin' this just for me.
